title: A Disastrous day
creator_credit: Abby Dietrich, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: It was a typical morning in Lennox Head for Abby Dietrich and her mother, when things changed dramatically. A tornado and intense storm were followed by calls from friends and family, and the community checking up on each other, helping out and cleaning up.
creator_credit_for_label: Abby Dietrich, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
